title: Futebol Clube do Porto (SC)
text:
Futebol Clube do Porto, commonly known as Porto, is a Brazilian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Porto%20Uni%C3%A3o">Porto União</a>, <a href="Santa%20Catarina%20%28state%29">Santa Catarina state</a>.
Stadium.
Futebol Clube do Porto play their home games at Estádio Municipal Antiocho Pereira. The stadium has a maximum capacity of 12,000 people.
